subject: Australian Football
Athletics and Sports
Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The sport’s most important player is the ruckman, who is typically tall and athletic, a combination that is rare in Australia but common in American college basketball.
snippet: The sport’s most important player is the ruckman, who is typically tall and athletic, a combination that is rare in Australia but common in American college basketball.
